id.description: The unique identifier for the AI chat message

content.description: The content of the AI chat message

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the AI chat message was created

aiChatId.description: The id of the AI chat this message belongs to This is used to associate the message with a specific AI chat.

role.description: The role of the message sender, either 'user' or 'assistant' This indicates whether the message was sent by the user or generated by the AI assistant.

id.description: The unique identifier for the AI chat.

name.description: The name of the AI chat. It can be used as a context information for the AI model and is also displayed in the UI.

description.description: The description of the AI chat in markdown format. This can be used to provide additional context or instructions for the AI model, and is also displayed in the UI.

createdAt.description: The date the AI chat was created.

owner.description: The owner username of the AI chat.

model.description: The model used by the AI chat, such as 'gpt-3.5-turbo' or 'gpt-4' This is the model that will be used to generate responses in the chat.

status.description: The status of the AI chat, indicating whether it is active or archived Archived chats can no longer be used for new messages, but can still be viewed and referenced.

visibility.description: Defines if the chat can be viewed by its owner only or if it's public to anyone who knows the ID.
